S-Mart is an online shopping app.It is developed by students from GCES college. You can buy any products from this app. \n \n
It was being developed since 2019 and launched in 2020. it is licensed by Nepal government and registered to a company, S-Mart. \n \n
In our app, Customers can create account and search for any products, add to cart and place order.Our customer can pay the cash on delivery and can return product within 7 days if product is not good.Delivery charges ia also free of cost.SO our customer need not worry about transportation fee and stuffs.They can just pay when they receive product \n \n
